name: Hacked Graft
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a Boosted-Graft or a Symbio-Graft ( ie : #L "Symbio-Graft: 1H Blunt Weapon Expertise" "127241" ) #L "Hacker Tool" "87814" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Hacker Tool + Graft = a Hacked Boosted-Graft ( ie : #L "Hacked Symbio-Graft: 1H Blunt Weapon Expertise" "127242" ) Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Override the profession requirement.
